blocks.html:
Ecological Intelligence is the sacred science of living in harmony with creation, integrating spiritual consciousness, environmental ethics, and divine stewardship.

At the Kashmir Sufi Science Center, under the Sufi Science Explorer Module, this study presents a structured approach to understanding ecology as a spiritual discipline.
